title: Are Two Handfuls of Cashews Equivalent to a Dose of Prozac for Depression?
subtitle: There is no evidence "two handfuls" of cashews are as effective as a dose of Prozac, despite a meme stating otherwise.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Two handfuls of cashews are equivalent to one dose of Prozac in treating depression, and can be safely substituted for prescribed drugs.
